name: 3D Space Shooter
description: I made this to improve my game developing skills. This game is not original and I know it. Most of the credit goes to @MasterAlbert at YouTube. He's a wonderful game developer and you can check him out. I added some extra stuff to his tutorial. I just hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoy making it.  There's an error if you're playing on the html file, I encourage you to download the exe file for a better experience.
